value:
Recruitable Heroes:
You can only recruit Heroes that
were released between Ver. 1.0
and Ver. 5.11.

You cannot recruit Heroes you
dispatch, or the Alfonse, Sharena,
or Anna from another world.

To celebrate the arrival of
Book VIII, a new castle design
is ready for you to use!

Take a look!
Having checked out the\nYggdrasill Castle design,\ndo you want to use it?
If you change your mind, tap\nUpgrade Castle, then Change\nDesign, then Yggdrasill Castle.
A statue of a denizen of Yggdrasill, the realm\nof the World-Tree. You feel its healing power\nwash over you when nearby. It's an event item.
Gate of Yggdrasill, realm of the World-Tree.\nThe silence that surrounds the mystical tree\ncalms the heart. It's an event item.
A wanted poster from Yggdrasill, realm of the\nWorld-Tree. Who put it up, and why? It's an\nevent item.
Used in Aether Raids to build structures that\nare available for a limited time. If that period\nhas elapsed, these stones will be lost.
